'''Temple of the Lion''' is a domain entrance located in [[Falcon Coast]]. It contains the [[One-Time Domain]] '''Investigate: Secret Hideout''', as well as the domains for [[Elemental Trial]].

==Location==
<gallery>
Domain Location Temple of the Lion.png|Domain Location
</gallery>

==Enemies==
The challenge is started by activating an Electro [[Elemental Monument]].

The player will have to defeat 20 Hydro and Cryo [[slimes]], including 2 Giant slimes, with not more than 15 seconds passing between each kill.

Immediately after, the player has to defeat 7 enemies, including 2 [[Abyss Mages]], one Cryo and one Hydro, and must not be frozen for more than 5 times.

==Elemental Trials==
[[Elemental Trial]]s can be unlocked at Adventure Rank 16 and are available in this domain.
